issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description: If a projection expression is unbound then we should bind it to the (augmented) dataset schema and carry on.  Instead it appears we are interpreting "unbound expression" as "nothing set at all" and loading all fields.
fields.summary: [C++] Unbound scan projection expression leads to all fields being loaded
